thought.text: Perfect! All critical tests are passing. Let me update the task tracker and move to Phase 8:

task_list.title: Phase 2: RUNNING - Set up and run tests
task_list.notes: Encountered Python compatibility issues, will focus on code exploration instead

task_list.title: Phase 3: EXPLORATION - Find related files
task_list.notes: Found the issue in models.py line 84 in _encode_params method

task_list.title: Phase 4: TEST CREATION - Create reproduction script
task_list.notes: Created simple_test.py that reproduces the UnicodeDecodeError

task_list.title: Phase 5: FIX ANALYSIS - Analyze the problem
task_list.notes: Identified the fix: only apply to_native_string to bytes if they decode as ASCII

task_list.title: Phase 6: FIX IMPLEMENTATION - Implement the fix
task_list.notes: Implemented refined heuristic that checks for printable ASCII characters

task_list.title: Phase 7: VERIFICATION - Test the implementation
task_list.notes: All critical tests pass - binary data preserved, URL params work, no regressions

task_list.title: Phase 8: FINAL REVIEW - Review and validate

function.arguments: {"command": "plan", "security_risk": "LOW", "task_list": [{"title": "Phase 1: READING - Understand the problem", "status": "done"}, {"title": "Phase 2: RUNNING - Set up and run tests", "status": "done", "notes": "Encountered Python compatibility issues, will focus on code exploration instead"}, {"title": "Phase 3: EXPLORATION - Find related files", "status": "done", "notes": "Found the issue in models.py line 84 in _encode_params method"}, {"title": "Phase 4: TEST CREATION - Create reproduction script", "status": "done", "notes": "Created simple_test.py that reproduces the UnicodeDecodeError"}, {"title": "Phase 5: FIX ANALYSIS - Analyze the problem", "status": "done", "notes": "Identified the fix: only apply to_native_string to bytes if they decode as ASCII"}, {"title": "Phase 6: FIX IMPLEMENTATION - Implement the fix", "status": "done", "notes": "Implemented refined heuristic that checks for printable ASCII characters"}, {"title": "Phase 7: VERIFICATION - Test the implementation", "status": "done", "notes": "All critical tests pass - binary data preserved, URL params work, no regressions"}, {"title": "Phase 8: FINAL REVIEW - Review and validate", "status": "in_progress"}]}
function.name: task_tracker
